solution_line_template: That means he needs to buy {total_noodles_needed}-{noodles_already_have}=<<{total_noodles_needed}-{noodles_already_have}={noodles_to_buy}>>{noodles_to_buy} pounds of noodles
So he needs to buy {noodles_to_buy}/{pounds_per_package}=<<{noodles_to_buy}/{pounds_per_package}={packages_to_buy}>>{packages_to_buy} packages
